mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.projectname AS "projectname", a.classes_id AS "classesId", a.team AS "team", a.polldate AS "polldate", a.location AS "location", a.score AS "score", a.polltype AS "polltype", a.source AS "source", a.filename AS "filename", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO student_projectpoll( id, projectname, classes_id, team, polldate, location, score, polltype, source, filename, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{projectname}, #{classesId}, #{team}, #{polldate}, #{location}, #{score}, #{polltype}, #{source}, #{filename}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE student_projectpoll SET projectname = #{projectname}, classes_id = #{classesId}, team = #{team}, polldate = #{polldate}, location = #{location}, score = #{score}, polltype = #{polltype}, source = #{source}, filename = #{filename}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
